text: @realDonaldTrump This isn’t about “big cost to pay” for #masks, you idiot. This is about saving lives which you have cost families because you didn’t heed #COVID19 warnings, decimated federal #pandemic planning & capacity to act, and are surrounded by #incompetents #ObamaWasBetterAtEverything
